responsibilities: Build and scale best in class data and reporting apps communicating metrics & performance indicators with the least latency and outstanding user experience.
Engage directly with key business partners to understand the business strategies and solution needs.
Drive and lead functional & technical discussions with development teams.
Design and own end to end applications.
Build various tools and features for Data and ML platforms, including data processing, insights portal, data observability, data lineage, model hub, and data visualization.
Work on building custom solutions ground up or customize open source products for Apple’s needs.
Produce high-quality software under tight deadlines and constraints.
Build innovative tools and frameworks that can extend the functionality of 3rd party BI tools using APIs.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building data and reporting applications, engaging with business partners, leading discussions, designing applications, and building tools for data and ML platforms. There is no mention of training or fine-tuning language models, which is a specific task related to machine learning and natural language processing. The responsibilities do not indicate any direct involvement with language models or their customization.
